mapper.insert: insert into platform_receive_order_approve_feedback (id, order_no, conclusion, approval_time, amount_type, approval_amount, term_unit, term_type, approval_term, pay_amount, remark, receive_amount, loan_term_option, max_loan_amount, min_loan_amount, range_amount, period_amount, refuse_time, supplements, user_type_group) VALUES (#{approveFeedbackEntity.id}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.orderNo}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.conclusion}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.approvalTime}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.amountType}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.approvalAmount}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.termUnit}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.termType}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.approvalTerm}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.payAmount}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.remark}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.receiveAmount}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.loanTermOption}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.maxLoanAmount}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.minLoanAmount}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.rangeAmount}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.periodAmount}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.refuseTime}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.supplements}, #{approveFeedbackEntity.userTypeGroup} )
